0: My husband left his personal pillow there and they actually located it and sent it to us

I know it was too cold to walk around To see the access to other sights so can not comment on location
Not only was he checking them in to the hotel he was also selling aquarium tickets and explaining transportation and directions
Lastly for those who complain that this hotel is too far from local attractions A There is a FREE trolley that stops on the street IN FRONT OF THE HOTEL
Also SKIP the food at the bar and and broad street grille located in the hotel both have terrible service and food is far from good
The main reason I would not stay here again is the location
The hotel is located off of the main streets of downtown Chattanooga however it is only a couple of blocks from all of the activity
The only complaint I had was the restaurant located inside the hotel
The towns free shuttle that runs every few minutes has a stop about a 3 minute walk from the hotel
